nodes.text: Simone Bianchi (born July 10, 1972) is an Italian comic-book artist who has provided art for the Star Wars 7 of Marvel Comics' 2015 Star Wars series. He has also drawn two "Vader" variant covers: one for the first issue of Star Wars, and the other for the first issue of the Darth Vader comic series.
His work also includes Shining Knight, Wolverine Vol 2 and Vol 3, Warren Ellis' Astonishing X-Men, Thor: For Asgard, and Jason Aaron's Thanos Rising.
